currency.description: Currency code in which the amount is expressed. ISO 4217

tax_included.description: true if the amount includes government taxes

postal_code.description: Postal code associated to the address

locality.description: City or locality where the user lives

country.description: Country of issuance of the id_document. Format iso3166-1

value.description: Id number associated to the id_document

id.description:
Unique identifier of this quota.
 This is a unique id, i.e.: it's the instantiation for a user of a mobile/landline/internet plan charactericic, voucher, etc.

name.description: Name of this quota. User Friendly field.

description.description: Description of this quota. User Friendly field.

categories.description: List of categories of a quota

start_date.description: start UTC time for the application of the quota

end_date.description: end UTC time for the application of the quota. Will not appear for quotas that never expire

active.description: Whether the quota is active or is currently inhibited

max.description: maximum amount allowed by current quota. -1 is interpreted as there is no limit

consumed.description: amount already consumed of current quota by this phone_number (as identified in the request URL)

remaining.description: amount remaining of the quota. -1 when quota is unlimited

is_shared.description: whether this quota is shared with other lines or not

tags.description: list of freely defined strings that tag the quota based on some criteria

QuotaDestination.description:
Destinations for which the quota applies. Multiples values must be understood as logical OR.
 Possible values are restricted to country values indicated in ISO 3166-1 alfa-2 and a list of enumerated values indicating 'telefonica', 'non-telefonica', 'rural', 'local', 'regional', 'national', 'international', 'mobile', 'landline', 'any'.

QuotaTimeBand.description: Timebands when the quota applies. Multiples values must be understood as logical OR

x-correlator.name: x-correlator
x-correlator.description: Correlation id for the different services

Page.name: page
Page.description: Requested page number for pagination purpose. If not included, page 1 is returned.

PerPage.name: per_page
PerPage.description: Number of element per page. If not included, a default number of 100 elements per page are returned.

QuotaCategories.name: categories
QuotaCategories.description: List of wanted categories separated by commas
